_exerciseType: Comment: DFA, NFA, REGEXP, GRAMMAR, PDA, TM.
_hardCodeCasesCounter: Comment: Number of hard code test cases.
_generatorflag: Comment: 0 - random generate strings, 1 - custom string generator in js file
description: Give a Turing Machine that accepts all strings that has a number of a’s that is a power of two.___. In other words, it implements the language in Turing Acceptable form.
